itunes:title: Episode 617 - Ender's Game Series Author Orson Scott Card
title: Episode 617 - Ender's Game Series Author Orson Scott Card
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Ender’s Game series author Orson Scott Card to discuss how he uses personal experiences as inspiration for common themes in his books such as understanding different cultures, they discuss how Ender’s...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Ender’s Game series author Orson Scott Card to discuss how he uses personal experiences as inspiration for common themes in his books such as understanding different cultures, they discuss how Ender’s character comprises several commonalities that parallels struggles humans face in trying to understand a world full of political turbulence and social pandemonium, Orson talks about Harrison Ford and Ben Kingsley starring in the “Ender’s Game” movie, and Orson explains what he believes is going to happen to the Western World based on the current state of social discourse.
